title: User Account - Password Reset
description: A user has forgotten their Windows password and is locked out of their computer.

tasks.description: Verify the user's identity over the phone using pre-defined security questions.
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician successfully authenticates the user.

tasks.description: Use the Active Directory management tool to reset the user's password.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user's password is reset in Active Directory.

tasks.description: Provide the temporary password to the user and instruct them to change it upon their first login.
tasks.expected_outcome: The user is able to log in and reset their password.
